name: DX Shachou Game
overview: DX Shachou Game is a board game in which up to 4 players compete to become president. The game features 12 different opponent to play against and the player can choose if he wants a male or a female candidate. There are 2 different maps to play in: The world map and the city map. The world map is divided into different parts of the world and the city map is divided into 4 different areas.
